# Open Graph

```javascript
{
  title: String, // og:title
  type: String, // og:type,
  url: String, // og:url,
  description: String, // og:description,
  image [{
    url:String, // og:image or og:image:url,
    secureUrl: String, // og:image:secure_url,
    type: String, // og:image:type,
    width: Number, // og:image:width,
    height: Number, // og:image:height
  }],
  audio [{
    url:String, // og:audio or og:audio:url,
    secureUrl: String, // og:audio:secure_url,
    type: String, // og:audio:type
  }]
}
```
